title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10051.6 - Public inspection of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10051.6 - Public inspection of records

State Regulations
(a) Records shall be made available at the
main office of the authority which is located at: Long Island Power Authority
200 Garden City Plaza

Garden City, NY 11530
(b) The authority shall accept requests for
records and produce records during regular business hours, Monday through

Friday. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
10051.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
